jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well,Please find the job description below; if you are interested, kindly let me know. Title: Program ManagerDuration : Initial 3 months possible extensionLocation: Atlanta, GA (Remote)Locals Required.Except OPT and H1T, All Work Authorization is WorkableWhile sharing the resume, Please do mention the candidate location and Work Authorization.Job Description:• Business Solutions ConsultantWhat we are looking for Years of Exp4-7 years Program Management experience4-7 years Experience in system implementation and supportBusiness Analysis experience preferred.Process Improvement experience preferred.HCM, HRMS system experience preferred. • Will be evaluating the strategic direction for Executive Reporting. Gather requirements from business users, understand reporting options, plot existing capabilities to required & desired features to options. Determine cost/benefit of options.• An individual with the software package selection process may align with this work• The CSR product is relatively old and fragile.• There is a request to:• Enumerate the current features/functions of the CSR product• Work with stakeholders to identify any existing gaps/pain points• Evaluate an alternative that may be introduced as part of the Elevate project• Do a side-by-side comparison of features/capabilities of the existing and Elevate alternative against features identified in 1&2• Determine cost of operating each solution• Provide a summary recommendation• In our old consulting practice, this was generally an IT Architect with some business consulting skills.• We did 'package selection' engagements to help our clients to pick a system to support some part of their operations (i.e. Workday vs. Oracle vs. SAP for HCM) Waiting for your response. Please share your available time so I can contact you directly by phone.
